name: Daviddeharbe.github.io
body:
### Welcome to my git hub

## Sofware projects

* veriT is a SMT solver hosted at [veriT-solver.org](http://www.verit-solver.org)
* b2llvm is a LLVM code generator now hosted on bitbucket
* nuCV is a forthcoming attempt at reviving the VHDL symbolic model checker CV.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
